Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2009 11:19AM Honey831 wrote: Hi mevanatta...... Sorry we have to meet under these circumstances but im glad to see  you have a great out look on things...Your right we all choose what is best for us.. Doesn't make it any less scarey..You didn't say anything about chemo so im guessing you don't need it and thats a good thing..Im sure you will do fine its the hand we were dealth and now we play it to win..Im on the tamox now myself at first it bothered me really bad i couldn't breath well so Doc told me to stop it... She then told me to start it again and i have now for the past 3 weeks it seems to be ok but we will see down the road how it makes me feel..I also had large ( girls) lol and chose reconstruction because i had a bi-lat mas. On the bright side its refreshing to have smaller (girls ) now lol..We are fighters all of us sisters and we never GIVE UP  WE STAND UP  so hope all is well with you and look forward to hearing from you soon                                                                               Hugsssss for now                                                                                   Honey831 P.S.
